text: "Cowboys from Hell" is a song by American heavy metal band Pantera. It's the opening track on the album Cowboys from Hell. It's the band's second single and the first with Phil Anselmo on vocals. Pantera has used the phrase "Cowboys from Hell" (or its abbreviation, CFH) on images and merchandise. ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Pantera songs Category:Groove metal songs Category:Thrash metal songs
title: Cowboys from Hell (song)
